entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 2 April 2023
